pages.text: Snakes usually appear in savannas, deserts and plains, where they prey on other animals, killing them with their venom.$(br2)Snakes may drop their Snake Tongue, though it may also be acquired from $(l:bewitchment:creatures/hellhound)Hellhounds$().$(br2)Snakes can be tamed with Raw Rabbit, and bred with Raw Chicken.

Snakes can be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiars$(). Witches with a Snake $(l:bewitchment:rituals/binding)Familiar$() are able to craft much more durable $(l:bewitchment:sigils/using_sigils)Sigils$().$(br2)Additionally, they benefit from poison; it does not harm them and refills their $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars#internalme)Internal ME Buffer$().
